price: They said, “We will persuade his father to send him[24], and we will surely do our best.”
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ
footnotes: [24] They knew its difficulty, but they still made a promise.
